sentences.english: Hair grows from deep within hair follicles , which are thin cavities embedded in the dermis.

sentences.english: A chronic fungous infection which involves the sebaceous glands and hair follicles may result in alopecia.

sentences.english: Hair is made in tiny pouches just under the skin's surface, known as follices.

sentences.english: Giant folliculosebaceous cystic hamartoma was diagnosed.

sentences.english: The deposition of mucin in the follicle was demonstrated by Alcian blue staining.

sentences.english: Side effects included the brief occurrence of irritant contact dermatitis and folliculitis during therapy.

sentences.english: However, hair follicles that are in catagen or telogen growth phases are less pigmented .

sentences.english: It is derived from the dermis mesenchyme , located at the base of the hair follicle.

sentences.english: This procedure uses tiny electric shocks to permanently destroy the hair follicles.
sentences.chinese: 該方法通過小量輕微的點擊來永久性破壞毛囊。
